channel.title: Class Suggestion: The Vampire
channel.description: Faction: Neutral, Killer Win requirement: Must kill all members of the main factions in order to win. **_Passives:_** One with the Night - Your night abilities do not count as visits. Vampiric Resilience - Death immune & bleed immune. **_Day Abilities_** Vampiric Charm - Force a player to vote for another and prevent further voting from them.(3 uses) Vampiric Hearing - Listen in on all whispers today. (2 uses) **_Night Abilities_** Bite - Bite a player, sucking them dry of their blood, killing them. (Infinite uses) Swarm of Bats - Attack a player and occupy all players visiting them. (2 uses)

One with the Night - Your night abilities do not count as visits.

I think “Army of the Night” sounds better.

CarnivalMaster:

Vampiric Resilience - Death immune & bleed immune at night.

Remove the at night part, newer players might get confused he could be bladed/wolfed/ruptured during the day

Thats ok
